law.catch_line: KRS 304.17A-740 to 304.17A-743 not applicable to audits conducted by state agency pursuant to KRS Chapter 205.
law.text: KRS 304.17A-740 to 304.17A-743 shall not apply to any audit conducted by or on behalf of a state agency pursuant to KRS Chapter 205.
law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 20, sec. 2, effective July 12, 2012. -- Created 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 76, sec. 4, effective June 25, 2009.
